channel.title: Flamescape V1 - 1000+ Downloads - Detailed
channel.description:
[b][u]What is flamescape?[/u][/b] Flamescape was a project that i started when i first entered the world of coding. I tried to base it around fire, hence the home bank having walls of fire. As i have said, i made this when i was new to coding, and although people seem to have liked it, i dont beleive that it is my best release
[b][u]What is so great about flamescape?[/u][/b]
I tried to do something no one has done before, i later learned that people had done it, but not released the source. The bank walls are somewhat special, as when i released, and up until now, i have not seen a server with them.
Flamescape has quite a few features, they are listed below.
Wyvern - Extremely unique Jad - Kill for Firecape Wishing Well - Pay a certain amount of money, for an item New Theiving - Located within edgeville general store New Shops - Just above the bank, next to the yew trees New Pk Area - Small glitch, you need to add one more global object to close it off Edge bank - Firewalled Summoning - Works, althought to summon, you need to drop the pouches.
[b][u]What is happening with flamescape at the moment?[/u][/b] I am currently working on a version 3 for my other source, earthscape, but as soon as i am done, flamescape version 2 will be started on.
Downloads - [url=http://uppit.com/1DLV40]Version One[/url] [url=http://sgclient.tk]Silabgarza Client[/url]
The client needed it listed above ( to see customs ) Normal Commands - [code]armorhelp pest rep pc gopc tz home client agility train wyvern dag defender jad wc pk dragons kqueen fish 3rdage farm slayer smith mypk gsmini starter [/code]
Staff Commands - [code] testskull gamecount eat alert lupdate pnpc giveadmin givemod giveowner Demote testminigame noclip xrichie xteleall pickup xteletome xteleto god godoff modzone membership suggest master clicks ipban banuser unban macrowarn getpass setlvls [/code]
Pictures -
[center]HomE [IMG]http://i333.photobucket.com/albums/m395/Xoo_0_ooX/home.jpg[/img]
Pk Area [IMG]http://i333.photobucket.com/albums/m395/Xoo_0_ooX/flamepk.jpg[/img]
Theiving [IMG]http://i333.photobucket.com/albums/m395/Xoo_0_ooX/theive-2.jpg[/img]
Shops [IMG]http://i333.photobucket.com/albums/m395/Xoo_0_ooX/servershops-1.jpg[/img]
Wyvern [IMG]http://i333.photobucket.com/albums/m395/Xoo_0_ooX/wyverm.jpg[/img]
Wishing Well [IMG]http://i333.photobucket.com/albums/m395/Xoo_0_ooX/well.jpg[/img]
DOWNLOAD LINK - http://uppit.com/1DLV40 [/center]
